page.title: 04ADLINGTON PEOPLE (continued)
page.content:
All church organisations take part supported by music from local bands.
For recreation throughout the year we have two large open spaces, but they are not supervised, and we feel that more could be done to provide for young people's leisure activities. The previous information demonstrates the active community life which the people have built for themselves. There are constant new endeavours; the carnival committee have developed an annual fun-run as just one of many activities spawned by their remarkable event.
This success as a community is despite the fact that most parents have to travel away from the area to work although we do have a few small industries and Leonard Fairclough Civil Engineering.
